item.title: Doug Wilson: Is the Constitution Dead & Fallout from The Tucker Carlson Interview! [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Doug Wilson. Doug is a Pastor, Author, and now a cultural phenomenon of sorts. Greg & Doug discussed the notion of whether or not the U.S. Constitution is dead, functionally or otherwise, if we need to "blow it all up" and start over, and how christians should view, respond and adhere to the it. Greg also enquired about Doug's recent appearance on Tucker Carlson, and how the response was from that. Enjoy!

item.title: Why do Leftists have to imitate Christianity? [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down for a family episode. Just him and the Deads. Greg asked the question "Why do Leftists and Democrats always seem to be imitating christian virtues?" He reviewed the recent media blitz of headlines using the word "joy" to promote candidate Kamala, and also reviewed the last 30 years of secularists coopting christian virtue. Why do they do this? Why MUST they do this? Give the episode a listen to find out! Enjoy! 

 

Send us a Text Message.

item.title: Jeremiah Nortier: Is the Doctrine of the Second Baptism of the Holy Spirit Biblical? [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Jeremiah Nortier. Jeremiah runs The Apologetic Dog Youtube channel and website. Jeremiah has debated all across the country. They discussed the points for and against this doctrine, examining verses in Ephesians, Corinthians, and Acts. This was a very informative episode. Enjoy!
